pageContext.claim: “For decades, politicians ran for office promising to protect American workers, but then, they went to Washington and they line their pockets with special-interest cash and they shipped American jobs and dreams to other countries. They closed up your factories. They got ready for jobs. They didn't have to pay taxes. Globalist politicians lowered our economic defenses and allowed other nations to rob our factories, steal our farms, and ransack our communities.”
pageContext.analysis: This is over-the-top rhetoric, offered with no evidence.
